title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Paradox-Based PBL Workshop for Enhancing Transnational Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain five transnational leadership paradoxes in contextually appropriate ways
Learners can identify three or more paradoxical situations in multicultural environments and propose solutions
Learners can collaborate with team members to design paradox-based problem-solving projects and develop implementation plans

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
